benchmark_details.name: FineMath (Fine-Grained Mathematical Evaluation Benchmark for Chinese Large Language Models)
benchmark_details.overview: FineMath is a fine-grained mathematical evaluation benchmark dataset for assessing Chinese LLMs, designed to cover key mathematical concepts taught in elementary school and categorize them into 17 types of math word problems, each annotated with their difficulty levels.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To comprehensively evaluate the mathematical capabilities of Chinese LLMs.

data.source: Collected from textbooks, workbooks, and the Internet, with manual annotation.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated based on the proportion of correct answers to the total questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better mathematical reasoning capabilities of the evaluated models.
